subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Eintracht Frankfurt ended visiting Borussia Mönchengladbach’s four-match winning streak and held Mönchengladbach, the third-place Bundesliga team, to a 0-0 draw.
snippet: Eintracht Frankfurt ended visiting Borussia Mönchengladbach’s four-match winning streak and held Mönchengladbach, the third-place Bundesliga team, to a 0-0 draw.
